text: This is a list of official mammals of U.S. states. ==State mammals== Key: Years in parentheses are the year of adoption by the state's legislature. Minnesota's unofficial state mammal is the eastern timber wolf. State Land mammal Marine mammal Wildlife mammal/animal Domestic mammal Alabama Racking horse (state horse) (1975) Alaska Arizona Arkansas California Colorado Connecticut Delaware Florida Georgia Hawaii Idaho Illinois Kansas Kentucky Louisiana Maine Maryland Massachusetts Michigan Mississippi Missouri Montana Nebraska Nevada New Hampshire Bobcat (state cat) (2015) New Jersey New Mexico New York North Carolina North Dakota Ohio Oklahoma Oregon Pennsylvania South Carolina Marsh Tacky (heritage horse) (2010) South Dakota Tennessee Texas Utah Vermont Virginia Virginia Big-Eared Bat (state bat) (2005) Washington West Virginia Wisconsin Wyoming == References == Mammals Category:Lists of animals of the United States Category:Lists of mammals
title: List of U.S. state mammals
